column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Radio host says : " You 're listening to " The Music Hour " !
#Text=I do n't care if we are the underdogs .
#Text=We can take those pompous Wolfbats .
#Text=" Mako says : " It 's going to be our toughest match ever , but I think you 're right .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Introducing your new champs , the fantastic Fire Ferrets !
#Text=" Amon says : " Good morning , citizens of Republic City .
#Text=This is Amon .
#Text=I hope you all enjoyed last night 's pro-bending match , because it will be the last .
#Text=It 's time for this city to stop worshiping bending athletes as if they were heroes .
#Text=I am calling on the council to shut down the bending arena and cancel the finals , or else there will be severe consequences .
#Text=" Bolin says : " That guy 's got some nerve .
#Text=" Mako says : " You think the council will give in ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not waiting to find out .
#Text=We need to get to City Hall .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , you should n't be here .
#Text=This is a closed meeting .
#Text=" Korra says : " As the Avatar and a pro-bending player , I have a right to be heard .
#Text=You ca n't cancel the finals .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I know winning the championship means a lot to you .
#Text=But as far as I 'm concerned , we need to shut the arena down .
#Text=" Korra says : " What about the rest of you ?
#Text=Tarrlok , there 's no way you 're backing down from Amon , right ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Actually , Tenzin and I agree for once .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The council is unanimous .
#Text=We 're closing the arena .
#Text=" Mako says : " No !
#Text=" Bolin says : " You ca n't !
#Text=" Korra says : " I - I do n't understand .
#Text=I thought you , of all people , would take a stand against Amon .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " While I am still committed to bringing that lunatic to justice , I will not put innocent lives at stake just so you and your friends can play a game .
#Text=" Mako says : " Pro-bending might only be a game to you , but think of what it means to the city !
#Text=Right now the arena is the one place where benders and nonbenders gather together ... in - in peace !
#Text=To watch benders ... " Bolin says : " Beat each other up !
#Text=In peace !
#Text=It 's an inspiration to everyone !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I appreciate your naive idealism , but you 're ignoring the reality of the situation .
#Text=" Korra says : " The reality is if you close the arena , you let Amon win !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes , exactly what she said !
#Text=Yes !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I 'm sorry , but our decision has been made .
#Text=This meeting is adjourned .
#Text="
